Familiar.description: Destroy 1 random card in your hand, add 3 random Enchanted face cards to your hand

Grim.description: Destroy 1 random card in your hand, add 2 random Enchanted Aces to your hand

Incantation.description: Destroy 1 random card in your hand, add 4 random Enchanted numbered cards to your hand

Talisman.description: Add a Gold Seal to 1 selected card in your hand

Aura.description: Add Foil, Holographic, or Polychrome effect to 1 selected card in your hand

Wraith.description: Creates a random Rare Joker, sets money to $0

Sigil.description: Converts all cards in hand to a single random suit

Ouija.description: Converts all cards in hand to a single random rank, -1 hand size

Ectoplasm.description: adds Negative to a random Joker, -1 hand size

Immolate.description: Destroys 5 random cards in hand, gain $20

Ankh.description: Create a copy of a random Joker, destroy all other Jokers

Deja Vu.description: Add a Red Seal to 1 selected card in your hand

Hex.description: Adds Polychrome to a random Joker, destroy all other Jokers

Trance.description: Add a Blue Seal to 1 selected card in your hand

Medium.description: Add a Purple Seal to 1 selected card in your hand

Cryptid.description: Create 2 copies of 1 selected card in your hand

Soul.description: Creates a Legendary Joker (must have room)

Black Hole.description: Upgrade every poker hand by 1 level
